title: Totally Not the Vaxx
author: VD
content_html:
It’s going to be interesting to see what runs out first, the supply of excuses or the supply of athletes and celebrities:

Fears for Harry Potter actor Tom Felton, 34, as he collapses during celebrity round of golf ahead of the Ryder Cup.

The actor, who turned 34 on Wednesday, was pictured being held up by colleagues and looking unwell on the course in Whistling Straits, Sheboygan, Wisconsin, earlier today.

Felton, who plays Draco Malfoy in the wizarding film franchise, was surrounded by concerned onlookers during the session in advance of the competition between Europe and the United States, which tees off on Friday.

He was joined on the course by fellow stars Teemu Selanne, Mandy Rose, Toni Kukoc, Mike Eruzione, Stephanie Szostak, A.J. Hawk, Dan Jansen, Alessandro Del Piero, Kelly Slater and Sasha Vujacic.

After receiving immediate attention he was then laid down on a cart and driven away for further treatment.

Keeping in mind that we have no idea why a 34-year-old man would collapse during a strenuous celebrity round of golf… it’s the vaxx again.

DISCUSS ON SG
